/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/Aruco_Markers.dir/test.cpp.o  -o Aruco_Markers  -L/usr/local/cuda/lib64 -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/lib helpers/libhelpers.a /usr/local/lib/libopencv_calib3d.so.3.4.15 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.3.4.15 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_features2d.so.3.4.15 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_flann.so.3.4.15 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videoio.so.3.4.15 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgcodecs.so.3.4.15 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.3.4.15 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so.3.4.15 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudev.so.3.4.15 -Wl,-rpath-link,/usr/local/lib
